column5: Hi, My sister-in-law has a place in Turkey Point and I would like to do some walleye fishing there. If you have any experience with the area, I would love some help.  Thanks in advance,  Mark

How big a boat do you have ? They get a mixed bag of bows and walleye out past Bluff Bar and around the tip of Long Point, but that is at least a 15 mile run and Erie is not a small boat friendly lake.
